Job Title: Front End Software Engineer (PHP & Tech SEO)
Job Description:
Front End Software Engineer (PHP & Tech SEO) – San Diego, CA

PeopleConnect is hiring for our People Search Division (aka The Control Group TCG) as our business is GROWING!!! We are looking for a talented, collaborative, Front End Software Engineer with PHP & Tech SEO experience to join our award-winning team. This is a unique hybrid opportunity to work with other smart inspired Developers, Designers and SEO professionals dedicated to developing and optimizing sites for increased traffic and conversions. Does the idea of playing an important role in developing and optimizing multiple websites seen by millions sound exciting? Would you like to be part of a pioneering tech community in a highly successful growing company? If so, then read on!

People Search (aka TCG) is an award-winning web development company with over 15 million customers nationwide. Our cutting-edge technology keeps people safe — both online and off. Our websites are consistently ranked in the top 500 top traffic sites in the US. Our products have been featured on the Discovery Channel, Mashable, Vice, Entrepreneur, Business Insider — and even made a cameo in a Disney animated comedy! A pioneer of new ideas, we’re constantly looking to develop and deploy innovative strategies and solutions. Our people and culture are second to none: we’re innovative, creative, collaborative and talented. We work hard, play hard, and together — we work magic!

Join our amazing team in our state-of-the-art office with stunning views of beautiful downtown San Diego, CA. Our dog-friendly office is packed with snacks and crazy-good perks (like free massages, kombucha on tap, free catered lunches, ping pong, video games, offsite team events and more)! We offer a highly competitive salary + bonus package, 100% company paid health insurance (Medical, Dental, Vision), UNLIMITED vacation, Paid Sick Leave, Paid Holidays, Student Loan Repayment Program, 529 Education Savings Plan, Training/Education Reimbursement, free Gym Membership, Paid Parking and 401k Plan with Company Match. Check us out here!

You understand the value of a well-crafted web page and how your code, set up and optimizing impacts traffic, user experience and conversions. You have a keen understanding of how web design/development helps company sites' most important pages boost the bottom line. You crave faster page speeds and have the skills and experience to track, triage and fix slowed sites. You are fluent in PHP, HTML, JavaScript, CSS and understand the world of optimizing SEO website performance.

Responsibilities:

Build, maintain, scale, optimize highly scalable front-end applications in support of multiple high volume SAAS products, marketing sites and SEO directories for optimum performance and to increase traffic and conversions.
Monitor online SEO website performance, page speeds, schema validation, HTML status codes.
Improve site speed, user experience, crawler accessibility.
Keep an eye on bugs and validation issues; investigate, troubleshoot and fix bugs.
Triage and fix issues that could be slowing down websites by fixing critical crawler errors, re-indexing pages, fixing duplicate content, redirecting URLs etc.
Build and heavily optimize customer facing SEO properties and feeder sites.
Optimize websites for search engine crawling and indexing.
Design, develop, and maintain multiple technical features.
Write/run A/B tests of meta data, content, content placement etc. to evaluate and optimize SERPs, improve SEO strategy and gain results.
Monitoring and reporting for web logs and data from Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools
Gather requirements from stakeholders.
Maintain quality and consistency of code on all sales funnels and SEO sites
Parse through php data sets and convert to content
Build and maintain web applications utilizing high-volume services via internal APIs
Consistently use web development and software engineering best practices
Break down complex tasks/requests into sub-tasks, make consistently good decisions, operate independently between regular or periodic check-ins.
Other duties as required.

REQUIREMENTS

BS Degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science or relevant field (or equivalent).
2-3 years Front-End Web Application development experience. Some experience in a SAAS company helpful.
At least 1 year experience with online SEO Website Performance Monitoring, Page Speeds, Schema Validation, HTML Status Codes. Must have a keen interest in Technical SEO.
Strong skills & experience with PHP, HTML, JavaScript.
Experience working with PHP templates
Solid working knowledge/skills with JSON and JS libraries such as jQuery, Ajax.
Solid understanding of technical SEO including sitemaps, meta tags, JavaScript indexing, linking, redirects, keyword research etc.
Solid working knowledge/skills with CSS preprocessors (Less or Sass)
Solid skills/experience with Photoshop, and working knowledge/skills with Illustrator and XD
Basic understanding of GIT or other versioning software.
Some experience/familiarity with the concept of testing.
Some experience and basic skills with Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Bing Webmaster Tools.
Some experience working in a micro services environment and working with APIs to retrieve data for use on page.
Multitasking is a must, bouncing from site to site and language to language.
Strong analytical skills geared towards CRO and SEO.
Able to troubleshoot and fix routine to moderately complex issues.
Some experience working with conversion rate optimization is desirable.
Must have very strong attention to detail.
Excellent communications skills and highly collaborative within their team, other teams and cross-functionally.
Able to work with teams as well as independently with minimal supervision.
Exceptional work ethic, driven, self-motivated, highly accountable with strong initiative and passion.
High sense of urgency, motivation and positivity, strong work ethic and pride in one's work.
Excited to learn new things and share knowledge and best practices with others.
